support.title: Salt Of The Earth
support.descp:
Every grain adds to the foundation...thank you so much! Be the very first to get a signed copy of Temporary Weather before its official January release date.
INCLUDES:
Digital Album Download
CD (Signed)

support.title: Healthy Helping Helper
support.descp:
Woah...thank you so MUCH! You're the real deal. You'll get 3 signed copies of Temporary Weather as gifts to friends, in time for Christmas!!
INCLUDES:
Digital Album Download
3 Signed CDs!

support.title: Hundred Hug Hero
support.descp:
YAY! Thank you SO much for your Beautiful Benjamin! You're going the extra mile. I'm honored! Along with CDs, I'll send you a beautiful signed Lyric Sheet poster for my title track, Temporary Weather.
INCLUDES:
Signed "Temporary Weather" Lyric Sheet
3 Signed CDs!
Digital Album Download

support.title: uGotMyBack, iGotYours
support.descp:
Look at you?! I feel like we're family. Related by our love of the song. This investment means so much. You're putting skin on this album's bones. I will send you a gorgeous, limited edition Temporary Weather T-shirt! (And all the other things).
INCLUDES:
Limited Edition TW T-shirt
All earlier thank you rewards!

support.title: Eternally Thanked!
support.descp:
WOW! This donation puts things on a whole other level. I'm floored.
You'll be recognized in the official liner notes which will forever be on each album. I'll also call you personally to thank you for your amazing gift.
INCLUDES:
Recognition in CD Liner Notes & BJV Thank You Call!
All earlier thank you rewards!

support.title: This Song is For You
support.descp:
Astounding! I'm speechless! If you are considering this, you are a touchstone in my life and in the life of these songs. I'm so honored to have you be part of this creation.
One of the songs will be dedicated to you, or the person/organization of your choice, in the liner notes. I'll send you a list to choose from...PLUS, I will create and record your own custom cover of a favorite non-BJV song!
INCLUDES:
A TW Song Dedicated to You and a Custom Cover Song!
All earlier thank you rewards!

support.title: A Love Song, LIVE! (Concert Reward)
support.descp:
Amazing! Your donation is often the difference between an album being able to happen, or not. I'm on the floor.
I will come perform a concert for you...for your organization, your community, your living room, just you and your family, your wedding...you name it, by the end of 2020. Travel is included. Can't wait.
INCLUDES:
Live Performance, Anywhere in the USA
All earlier thank you rewards!

support.title: Your Show and Your Song!
support.descp:
Unbelievable. You even looking at this number, to help an artist get their heart and voice out into the world...it blows me away. Thank you SO much.
I will write you, your organization, or anyone you love a song...AND I will come sing it (and others) in a concert, anywhere in the USA, for you and anyone you want to bring!
INCLUDES:
A Song Written for You!
Live Performance, Anywhere in the USA
Limited Edition TW T-shirt
Recognition in CD Liner Notes & BJV Thank You Call!
CD (Signed)
Digital Album Download
Signed "Temporary Weather" Lyric Sheet

support.title: Over the Moon Reward!
support.descp:
WOW! Expressions of extravagant generosity like this are why art gets to stay alive. Thank you so much!
With my deepest gratitude, I will perform a concert for you; I will write you a song; I will call you with tears of joy and thanks; I will name you as Executive Producer. I will come live with you for a month. (Okay, maybe not that last one.) But everything else...I am over the moon and you sent me there. Thank you.
INCLUDES:
"Executive Producer" naming on album.
Live Performance, Anywhere in the USA
A TW Song Dedicated to You and a Custom Cover Song!
All earlier thank you rewards!

campaign.story:
Imagine being able to transform anything you see, any beautiful image, piece of art you’ve created, or precious moment with your family, friends or significant others into something that you can hold, something that you can feel, and something that you can give. More specifically, preserve these memories onto photo-realistic clothing that will last a lifetime!
Mike Krilivsky, creator of RageOn.com, “World’s Largest All-Over-Print Online Store”, is giving smartphone users the ability to convert their memories into vibrant, wearable merchandise using a new mobile app, SnapShirt!
SnapShirt offers a simple elegance to capturing life in its purest and most organic form: from your fingertips, directly into print.
Cherished photographs of your loved ones, wild nights with friends, or even your artwork can now be printed onto TOP QUALITY T-shirts, tank tops, sweatshirts, socks, and more!
The process is simple – view your image directly on our mockup, snap a photo, and your all-over print product will be delivered to your door in days.
SnapShirt aims to enhance peoples’ lives by giving them the greatest creative tool for making high-quality custom clothing. It will change the way that keepsakes are both made and passed down in our modern age. SnapShirt will serve as a tool for designers looking to start their own clothing companies or help the people who simply want to share their creativity with the world. It has potential to become the go-to platform for artists, entrepreneurs, families, and more.
The possibilities are endless, and this is only the beginning.
Back in 2010, we started a clothing line called Let’s Rage. Despite impressive growth, there were some intense challenges. 
Our main problem was the costly process of producing new designs. This nearly stopped us in our tracks, just as it stops most artists and entrepreneurs from doing what they love, which is creating. 
We went on a worldwide hunt to find a manufacturer that believed in our idea. However, we were told NO over a 100 times and that our idea was impossible. 
We were able to overcome this problem by teaming up with some amazing people, solidifying our own printing equipment, and mastering the art of dye-sublimation, also known as all-over printing. 
We have committed our professional careers to working with some of the most amazing artists, photographers, and celebrities in giving them the ability to turn their dreams and visions into wearable merchandise.  
Now, it’s your turn.
Once an order is placed, SnapShirt will use our sophisticated algorithm to change your photo into a print-ready file. This will be sent to our production line, then manufactured, and lastly, shipped to you! Over the years while printing for RageOn.com, we have perfected our proprietary process of dye sublimation to produce un-matched, photo-realistic quality.
Our apparel lasts forever or your money back! We work with some of the most skilled cut & sewers and manufacturers in the world. We use a precise combination of heat, pressure, and time to change each individual clothing fiber to make the most high quality, durable, and vibrant garments you will ever see! These incredibly soft garments wick away heat and moisture, for a cool, relaxed feel :)
Let’s get creative! We will be releasing 5 exclusive shirt designs as we hit milestones! Next, we have some incredible stretch goals for both custom & Rage On designs in even more options, like: zip-up hoodies, pillows, blankets, and more!
Your support means the world to us. Together, we’ll create a tool that will modernize the way in which custom clothing is made to order in the 21st Century.
We understand that nothing is more important than the voice of the user. Let’s build a relationship, ensure simplicity, and challenge the accepted idea of what is possible. Thank you. - The SnapShirt Team 
Here's a massive selection of rewards to choose from! Be the first to create your own custom design or choose from thousands of Rage On products at tremendous discounts! Enjoy!
*Backers can receive custom designs or choose from thousands of products available from the following RageOn.com brands: Let's Rage, Classics, Kan D Shoppe, High Times, Cereal Killers, Costume Party, Psychedelia, Wild Life, 8bit.
Here is a more in depth look at SnapShirt and our vision. We created an “extended video” that includes: more modeling scenes, a heartfelt moment of my brother and sister, both of which have since passed and whom I dedicate this app to, a sneak peak at what our party with celebrity guest reward might look like (actual party footage from one of our events), some new music, and more!
SNAPSHIRT & MY INSPIRATION:
One quintessential detail of every large project I take on is that there is a greater purpose with what I’m doing. For some people, it’s money, for others it’s success, for me, it’s always been about something bigger.
The most substantial aspect of my motivation for creating SnapShirt is the ability to give something incredible for FREE to each and every person in this world, something that my brother, Jerry, and sister, Sarah who tragically passed would be proud of.
One might think that as the founder of Rage On, I would have the ability to make custom apparel. The truth is, I’ve always had this ability— however, the process of making custom merchandise was extremely inefficient. Despite having hundreds of Rage On fans ask us for this feature every day, we still had to find a way to automate this system.
I always figured there would come a time when I could make the process to create custom apparel easier for us and fans alike. Unfortunately, this time came too late and the passing of Jerry and Sarah showed me just how fragile life can be. This realization pushed me to finally build something I could give my family and friends so that they might capture the moments they spend together, while also creating a physical memento that will last a lifetime.
The tragic events of my personal life, the requests of Rage On fans around the world, and seeing the joy the ability to create something personalized brings to people are what continue to push me to build something revolutionary.
SnapShirt is an app that is dedicated to everyone— every kid who dreams of starting a clothing company, every artist who dreams of making their artwork a reality, everyone who dreams of reliving a moment. Most importantly, I am dedicating SnapShirt to my brother and sister.
My heart, mind, and soul are committed to changing the future with SnapShirt. Thanks to this app, any funny, artsy, or cherished moment can instantly be made into virtually anything. Once SnapShirt is complete, you and I will never again have to wait to commemorate our visions— we will only need to pioneer them.
I have been fortunate enough to work with some of the best people that I’ve met in my entire life and am thankful to have these people help complete this project with me. SnapShirt will be the easiest and most fun way for families, friends, and artists around the world to turn memories into wearable merchandise. Most importantly, YOU will be able to make your dreams, memories, and creations a reality that will last forever.
Please enjoy our gift to you!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The development of the SnapShirt project is well underway. We have millions of fans, demand for custom apparel, and a giant demand for all over printing. We’ve secured a patent pending process as well as ownership of the SnapShirt.com domain. The graphic design is done, the manufacturing equipment is there, and the workers are in place. 

The risk and challenge will be to hire the best development team possible in order to build a truly innovative and simple to use app! We want it to be easy for you to make funny, entertaining, and special gifts for your friends and families! We want the artists or entrepreneurs with no start up monies to test their ideas :)

We've proven we can overcome obstacles in the past with Rage On. The world we live in wants freedom and to be limitless. SnapShirt taps into these very ideals and our team won't let you down!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Michael Krilivsky
First created · 185 backed
BIO: “Mike Krilivsky is a creator, an innovator, and a successful entrepreneur co-founding and partnering up some of the greatest startup...See more

updates.update_content:
You’re seriously the BEST! Thanks to the many generous donations from people like LeBron James, iJustine, and each of you, our Kickstarter has HIT OUR GOAL in just 10 days!
However, we’re not done yet! We have 20 days left to unlock some amazing stretch goals and grab some super limited and exclusive designs! Who doesn't want some pepperoni pizza sandals to match their pizza leggings?
All of us at SnapShirt would like you personally thank you for your excitement, encouragement, and generosity in regards to this project. Thank you to all the wonderful websites like !

updates.update_userinfo: SnapShirt hit over 50%! Get NEW Rewards and Exclusive Designs!
updates.update_content:
When we launched a Kickstarter campaign for SnapShirt, we were amazed by the overwhelming show of support from our awesome fans and friends!
In less than a week, we’ve raised over 50% of our $50,000 goal! 
PLUS, SnapShirt has started receiving a TON of press from places like JackThreads, FashionWeekDaily, CrowdFundingPR, Pixable, Daily Dot, and even 36kr one of the top ranking sites in China! 
We can’t thank you enough for all of your help!

project_data.project_name: SnapShirt - Turn your photos into all-over print clothing!

campaign.story:
ALERT!
We have learned that Kickstarter rules do not allow the $100K match! It turns out that the most any one person may pledge is $10,000. This means we cannot double your pledge as we intended. You are free to increase, decrease or cancel your pledge, whatever seems right to you. Thank you all for coming on this amazing journey!
Must read FIRST!
New to Kickstarter? Here's the most important thing about it: It's all or nothing. If we reach our $300,000 goal, The Christ Quake gets funded, you get to help make a great film, and everyone is happy! If we don’t reach our goal, the pledges you see above instantly vanish, none of you is ever charged, you don't get to help, The Christ Quake is not funded, and everyone is sad. 
Nutshell: get your DVDs -->NOW<-- or we can't make the film!
The Motive
The New Testament records unexpected, unlikely physical events forming bookends of the earthly life of Jesus. Many doubt the historicity of the Star of Bethlehem marking his birth, or the quake on the day of the cross marking his death. But if these bookends were actual historical events, would there be some evidence of them? Can we identify such evidence at 2,000 year’s distance? 
That’s the fundamental question and endeavor behind two film projects. Our first film foray investigated the first event. It resulted in The Star of Bethlehem. A roaring success. Now we're moving to the second event. Instead of looking up to the heavens, we’re looking down at the earth—The Christ Quake is a geophysical investigation. And it, too, is proving hugely exciting! 
The Goal
We hope to amaze you, perhaps blow you away with fresh revelations deep within a story you thought you knew. You, your friends, your family, your coworkers will join a journey of eye-witness discovery. Nature is blindly destroying the evidence at this moment. But, before the traces are erased, we will document a stunning story for the eyes of the world. We’ll examine mysteries sometimes thought sacrosanct, beyond inquiry. If we do our job right, the rocks will "cry out.” They will give stony witness to the most well-known event in human history. This film, your film, will entertain, but always from a firm foundation of fact. It's a real-life adventure, chasing vanishing clues to a pivotal mystery before it is too late. The clock is ticking!
The Money
You're looking at this page because we need funding to make the film. So, how does that work? Our Kickstarter goal is $300,000. We’re hoping for a great deal more. The more stout our budget, the more we can share with you on screen.
You can see we spent a good chunk of savings to make the trailer for you. I have “skin in the game,” as they say. I’m committed to a full-quality production whatever the budget might finally be. Whatever is required of me financially, I will do. Because, this story must be told. But, good people, we need your generous help to make this film all it can be!
The Reward
There are many ways to get paid. Money is only one. Likewise, there are many types of Rewards. We've setup great Rewards for your support! But your real Reward is quite different. Here is a chance for you to enable something important. To empower a project that will have a worldwide impact. Wouldn't you like to be part of that?
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
THE BUDGET
If you’re familiar with budgets for Hollywood films, you know that even simple stories normally cost millions of dollars to tell. This project will be completed with high production values, including gorgeous photography and a dramatic original orchestral score. What will be different from a studio production is our budget! We’ll be on a shoestring.

Kickstarter projects are allowed to raise far more than their goals, and we certainly hope you dear donors will provide us seven figures to work with. But, however much you do provide, we commit that this film will be exceptionally strong for the money spent. Your support will be applied wisely, artistically, cleverly! The result will be a satisfying movie value.

TECHNIC
We hope to break new ground, and this will require use of materials and processes which are not common. We have consulted with experts and academics for guidance in these areas. We are excited to bring to screen fascinating results of fairly esoteric technical analysis. 

POLITICAL STABILITY
Fortunately, most of the Israel location footage is already in the can. But we may need to return for interviews with our intrepid Israeli academics. While this could be problematic if Israel goes to war footing, we’ll cross that bridge when we come to it.

CAN WE DO IT?
What makes us think we can produce this film? Our team and our experience. Our last film, The Star of Bethlehem, has repeatedly been a top-selling indie (non-studio) documentary worldwide. That includes multiple visits to the #1 spot at Amazon.

In addition to wide success of the physical DVD, Larson has spent hundreds of hours doing television and radio interviews reaching audiences of millions. He and/or the DVD have been featured on ABC, CBS, NBC, EWTN, TBN, FOX News and numerous international and radio networks. Both PBS and the BBC flew film crews to film in the Larson home. When both American and UK public networks get on planes, that's a pretty big deal. We would love to do all of this hard work again! You've just watched the teaser. You know we can do this. Help!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.creator_bio:
Rick Larson
First created · 1 backed
Frederick A. Larson did not intend to attend college but wound up a professor. Larson's life-path was completely redirected by study under...See more

updates.update_userinfo: Christ Quake project is very much alive!
updates.update_content: If an additional $10,000 are pledged from now through this weekend, we have a MATCH of $10,000! This means that any pledge you make during the challenge will be DOUBLED if we make the goal of $58,962. We thank Anonymous for this generous kickstart! If you’re thinking about pledging or increasing your pledge, this would be a good time to do it. For a few days, you’ve got 2X leverage. Go for it!

If I know anything about spiritual warfare, Dr. G is coming under attack. A "problem" came up which prevented our discussing the Quake Project this afternoon as planned. We rescheduled for tomorrow morning at 8.30a. Do you have any doubt what will be attempted against this man tonight? A man who has interest in helping?
It is top priority that we provide prayer cover for him. We need to pray that the "problem" does not blossom. That the evil one's every attempt to spoil and destroy will instead itself be spoiled and destroyed. May the our Lord and his armies romp and stomp tonight!
